titles.title: Providing for the correction of the enrollment of H.R. 5021.
Providing for the correction of the enrollment of H.R. 5021.

action.text: Mr. Chaffetz asked unanimous consent to consider as introduced.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate, pursuant to the order of 7/23/2014, without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Directs the Clerk of the House of the Representatives to make corrections in the enrollment of H.R. 5021 (Highway and Transportation Funding Act of 2014) by prohibiting the budgetary effects of that Act and its amendments from being entered on the PAYGO scorecards of either the House of Representatives or of the Senate.
